about.title: About Me
about.summary: Computer Engineer with experience in web development using Angular, TypeScript and TailwindCSS. Passionate about innovation and continuous improvement, with skills in agile methodologies and multidisciplinary teamwork. I have participated in SaaS solutions, web scraping projects and scalable web applications in sectors such as hospitality, mining and telecommunications.

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui
